parse.title: List of public art in Copenhagen

text.*:
Map all coordinates using: OpenStreetMap 
Download coordinates as: KML · GPX
This list is incomplete; you can help by expanding it.

This is a list of public monuments and memorials in Copenhagen, Denmark.

Contents

  • 1 City (Indre By)
  • 2 Frederiksberg
  • 3 Nørrebro
  • 4 Østerbro
  • 5 Vesterbro/Kongens Enghave
  • 6 Amager
  • 7 Bispebjerg
  • 8 Brønshøj-Husum
  • 9 Valby
  • 10 Vanløse
  • 11 Suburbs
    • 11.1 Gentofte Municipality
    • 11.2 Hørsholm Municipality
    • 11.3 Hvidovre Municipality
    • 11.4 Lyngby-Taarbæk Municipality
  • 12 References
  • 13 External links
